Note:
LOCATION (8-bit)
0x00=Battle Select
0x01=Option Mode
0x02=Game Option
0x03=Button Config.
0x05=Backup
0x08=Game Data
0x09=Show Data
0x0b=Personal Data
0x16=Fighting

MENUS NAV (8-bit)

BATTLE SELECT
0x00=Arcade Battle
0x01=Point Battle
0x02=Free Battle
0x03=Option

GAME OPTION
0x00=Difficulty
0x01=Game Speed
0x02=Time Count
0x03=Round (CPU)
0x04=Round (VS)

ROUNDS - 2P (8-bit)

0x02=1 win
0x01=2 wins

0x01=2 wins
0x00=3 wins
